Name: Berry
Effect: Restores 10 HP when at 50% max HP or less.

Name: Berry Juice
Effect: Restores 20 HP when at 50% max HP or less.

Name: Berserk Gene
Effect: On switch-in, raises holder's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.

Name: Bitter Berry
Effect: Holder is cured if it is confused.

Name: Black Belt
Effect: Holder's Fighting-type attacks have 110% power.

Name: Black Glasses
Effect: Holder's Dark-type attacks have 110% power.

Name: Bright Powder
Effect: Lowers opponent's move accuracy by ~8%.

Name: Burnt Berry
Effect: Holder is cured if it is frozen.

Name: Charcoal
Effect: Holder's Fire-type attacks have 110% power.

Name: Dragon Scale
Effect: Holder's Dragon-type attacks have 110% power.

Name: Focus Band
Effect: Holder has ~12% chance to survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP.

Effect: Restores 30 HP when at 50% max HP or less.

Name: Hard Stone
Effect: Holder's Rock-type attacks have 110% power.

Name: Ice Berry
Effect: Holder is cured if it is burnt.

Name: King's Rock
Effect: Holder's attacks without a chance to flinch gain a 10% chance to flinch.

Name: Leftovers
Effect: At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP.

Name: Light Ball
Effect: If held by a Pikachu, its Special Attack is doubled.

Name: Lucky Punch
Effect: If held by a Chansey, its critical hit ratio is raised by 2 stages (25% critical rate).

Effect: Holder's Electric-type attacks have 110% power.

Name: Metal Powder
Effect: If held by a Ditto, its Defense and SpDefense stats are 150%, even while Transformed.

Effect: Holder wakes up if it is asleep.

Name: Miracle Berry

Effect: Holder's Grass-type attacks have 110% power.

Name: Mystery Berry
Effect: Restores 5 PP to the first of the holder's moves to reach 0 PP.

Effect: Holder's Water-type attacks have 110% power.

Effect: Holder's Ice-type attacks have 110% power.

Effect: Holder's Normal-type attacks have 110% power.
